ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '7'
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '7'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
pin_run_as_build:
  qt:
    max_pin: x.x
qt:
- '5.12'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.description:
KService provides a plugin framework for handling desktop services.
Services can be applications or libraries. They can be bound to MIME
types or handled by application specific code.
about.license: GPL-2.0-only AND GPL-2.0-or-later AND GPL-3.0-only AND LGPL-2.0-only AND LGPL-2.0-or-later AND LGPL-2.1-only AND LGPL-3.0-only AND LicenseRef-KDE-Accepted-GPL AND LicenseRef-KDE-Accepted-LGPL

about.description:
KService provides a plugin framework for handling desktop services.
Services can be applications or libraries. They can be bound to MIME
types or handled by application specific code.
about.license: GPL-2.0-only AND GPL-2.0-or-later AND GPL-3.0-only AND LGPL-2.0-only AND LGPL-2.0-or-later AND LGPL-2.1-only AND LGPL-3.0-only AND LicenseRef-KDE-Accepted-GPL AND LicenseRef-KDE-Accepted-LGPL

name: kservice
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "kservice" %}
{% set version = "5.76.0" %}
{% set major_minor = ".".join(version.split(".")[:2]) %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://download.kde.org/stable/frameworks/{{ major_minor }}/kservice-{{ version }}.tar.xz
  sha256: ef7715e5d3e0bf4fc2d28a7713913a1283fb9c658b3c3536a6db8da649d185bf

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [not linux]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('kservice', max_pin='x.x') }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - make
    - extra-cmake-modules >={{ version }}
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libgl-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-dri-drivers') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libselinux') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxxf86vm') }}  # [linux]
  host:
    - xorg-libxfixes  # [linux]
    - xorg-libxext
    - qt
    - flex
    - bison >=2.4.1
    - ki18n >={{ version }}
    - kcrash >={{ version }}
    - kconfig >={{ version }}
    - kcoreaddons >={{ version }}
    - kdbusaddons >={{ version }}
    - kwindowsystem >={{ version }}
    - xcb-util-keysyms

test:
  commands:
    - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libKF5Service.so

about:
  home: https://api.kde.org/frameworks/kservice/html/index.html
  license: GPL-2.0-only AND GPL-2.0-or-later AND GPL-3.0-only AND LGPL-2.0-only AND LGPL-2.0-or-later AND LGPL-2.1-only AND LGPL-3.0-only AND LicenseRef-KDE-Accepted-GPL AND LicenseRef-KDE-Accepted-LGPL
  license_file:
    - LICENSES/GPL-2.0-only.txt
    - LICENSES/GPL-2.0-or-later.txt
    - LICENSES/GPL-3.0-only.txt
    - LICENSES/LGPL-2.0-only.txt
    - LICENSES/LGPL-2.0-or-later.txt
    - LICENSES/LGPL-2.1-only.txt
    - LICENSES/LGPL-3.0-only.txt
    - LICENSES/LicenseRef-KDE-Accepted-GPL.txt
    - LICENSES/LicenseRef-KDE-Accepted-LGPL.txt
  summary: Plugin framework for desktop services
  description: |
    KService provides a plugin framework for handling desktop services.
    Services can be applications or libraries. They can be bound to MIME
    types or handled by application specific code.
  dev_url: https://cgit.kde.org/kservice.git/tree

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - scopatz
